DOC.detailed_description: This study cross-sectional , questionnaire-based psychometric study . The purpose study : ( 1 ) use Rasch methodology ass reliability , construct validity , overall appropriateness test score interpretation 5 shoulder-related patient report outcome measure patient experience shoulder dysfunction follow neck dissection surgery head neck cancer ; ( 2 ) base finding , provide recommendation patient report outcome measure combination measure accurately reflect shoulder disability patient experience shoulder dysfunction follow neck dissection surgery . Two-hundred fifty subject recruit regularly schedule clinical visit Mayo Clinic . Subjects complete five shoulder-related patient report outcome measure one occasion , therefore subject responsible study participation time enrollment day completion study-related document . Upon conclusion data collection , Rasch analysis utilized analyze data relate research objective , descriptive statistic utilized describe sample .
